component.text:
. . .
Section 6.2.7.3,"Configure routing protocols in the WAN network module":
  • Number of routers involved is 6.
  • Use template from section 4.3.1,"EIGRP details."
  • Per router configuration:
    • - Use passive-interface command on all nonbackbone LANs.
    (See section 4.2.3, "EIGRP details.")
    - Use summarization according to the design.
    (See section 4.2.3, "EIGRP details." and section 4.2.2, "Addressing details.")
  • Estimated time is 30 minutes per router.
    If needed, use roll-back procedure defined in section 6.2.7.4.
    • . . .
